item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 29, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenWrt Two Approval (125 points | 64 comments)
2. Mathematical Compact Models of Advanced Transistors [pdf] (17 points | 1 comment)
3. Plain – a web framework for building products with Python (108 points | 79 comments)
4. Scammers Steal $1T a Year – Mostly from Americans (15 points | 8 comments)
5. We hacked Gemini's Python sandbox and leaked its source code (at least some) (502 points | 107 comments)
6. iCloud Mail has DNS misconfigured? (147 points | 54 comments)
7. Playstation Mod Turns the PSOne into a Crustacean (39 points | 8 comments)
8. Noise cancellation improves turn-taking for AI Voice Agents (82 points | 23 comments)
9. Conquest of the Incas (49 points | 13 comments)
10. Xee: A Modern XPath and XSLT Engine in Rust (333 points | 177 comments)
11. How to write blog posts that developers read (433 points | 134 comments)
12. Emulating the YM2612: Part 1 – Interface (13 points | discuss)
13. Show HN: An Almost Free, Open Source TURN Server (104 points | 36 comments)
14. Testing Without Mocks: A Pattern Language (2023) (54 points | 16 comments)
15. Self-Supervised Learning from Images with JEPA (24 points | 5 comments)
16. The Curious Case of Beam CPU Usage (2019) (5 points | 1 comment)
17. DIY PTP Grandmaster Clock with a Raspberry Pi (80 points | 20 comments)
18. Upcoming Windows 11 builds cannot install without internet and Microsoft Account (135 points | 111 comments)
19. Window cleaner in quest to confirm priceless Shakespeare portrait (7 points | 2 comments)
20. Show HN Pianoboi – displays sheet music as you play your piano (26 points | 3 comments)
21. Digital Echoes and Unquiet Minds (120 points | 66 comments)
22. xAI has acquired X, xAI now valued at $80B (576 points | 784 comments)
23. Decomposing a Factorial into Large Factors (110 points | 24 comments)
24. Optimizing Matrix Multiplication on RDNA3 (78 points | 12 comments)
25. I asked police to send me their public surveillance footage of my car (574 points | 438 comments)
26. Finley (YC W21) Is Hiring a Technical Implementations Specialist ( | hide)
27. Show HN: Hexi – Modern header-only network binary serialisation for C++ (86 points | 33 comments)
28. The Real Book (2021) (114 points | 25 comments)
29. The Biology of B-Movie Monsters (2003) (80 points | 42 comments)
30. MilliForth-6502: The smallest Forth real programming language for 6502 (109 points | 31 comments)
